item.description:
NOTE: due to the fact that I will be on the club trip to California, the NH August meetup will be on a different day than usual.

Come meet like-minded adventure travelers who are interested in exploring exciting and off-the-beaten-path destinations around the world. Share stories of past adventures and talk about future ones! We usually discuss actual up-coming club group tours, as well as tour that members would like to take. We typically have 10 - 20 people show at our meetups!

It doesn't matter whether you are a solo traveler, a couple or just friends; everyone is welcome. Please contact me if you'd like to attend so I can be sure to keep an eye out for you. Email Kevin

We try to meet at the high tables immediately on the left as you enter the Page Bar (172 Hanover St Portsmouth)... just ask for Kevin.
item.how_to_find_us: We try to meet at the high tables immediately on the left as you enter the Page.
item.name: NH/Seacoast International Adventure Travel Club August Meetup
